member.name: T:AD.EntityFramework.BulkCopyExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods to expose the PostgreSQL COPY command for the bulk import of data.

member.name: M:AD.EntityFramework.BulkCopyExtensions.BulkCopy(System.Data.Entity.DbContext,System.String,System.Data.Entity.DbSet,AD.IO.XmlFilePath)
member.summary: Imports data records from an XDocument to the specified table. First, existing rows are deleted, then new records are imported. This occurs within a transaction.
member.param: The that encapsulates the necessary tables and credentials.
The name of the schema for the table.
The entity to which records are copied.
An wherein the children of the root element are record elements.

member.name: M:AD.EntityFramework.BulkCopyExtensions.BulkCopy(System.Data.Entity.DbContext,System.String,System.String,AD.IO.XmlFilePath)
member.summary: Imports data records from an XDocument to the specified table. First, existing rows are deleted, then new records are imported. This occurs within a transaction.
member.param: The that encapsulates the necessary tables and credentials.
The name of the schema for the table.
An wherein the children of the root element are record elements.
The name of the table to which records are copied.

member.name: T:AD.EntityFramework.ReduceExpressionExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods to translate extension methods into expression trees for consumption by Entity Framework.

member.name: M:AD.EntityFramework.ReduceExpressionExtensions.ReduceExpression``1(System.Linq.IQueryable{``0})
member.summary: Reduces expression complexity by inlining method calls marked with the EntityFrameworkExtensionAttribute.
member.typeparam: The type of element in the IQueryable.
member.returns: An IQueryable with calls to methods marked with the EntityFrameworkExtensionAttribute removed from the internal expression.
